instructions: Image titled Import Contacts on WhatsApp on Android Step 1 1 Open WhatsApp Messenger. The WhatsApp icon looks like a green speech bubble with a white telephone in it. Image titled Import Contacts on WhatsApp on Android Step 2 2 Tap the New Chat button. This button looks like a white speech bubble icon in the upper-right corner of your CHATS screen. It will open a list of all your WhatsApp contacts. If WhatsApp opens up to a different page than CHATS, go back and tap the CHATS tab to see a list of all your conversations. Image titled Import Contacts on WhatsApp on Android Step 3 3 Tap the three vertical dots icon. This is your menu button in the upper-right corner of your screen. It will open a drop-down menu. Image titled Import Contacts on WhatsApp on Android Step 4 4 Tap on the menu. This will refresh the page and update your contacts list on WhatsApp. Any new phone contacts will now be imported to your WhatsApp contacts list. Advertisement
